channel.title: Where can I buy
channel.description: A graphics card? Would I be able to buy one from the common Wal-mart? Don't really feel like going and realizing they don't sell one. I have a best buy, a mall, K-mart, and Wal-mart near me.

item.title: Where can I buy
item.dc:creator: @Wrauld Wrauld
item.description:
@Wrauld wrote:

newegg.com

Computer Parts, Laptops, Electronics, and More - Newegg.com

Providing computer parts and hardware, hard drives, cameras and software as well as electronics, tools, appliances, sporting goods, jewelry, watches, gaming, and much more. With fast-shipping! Newegg shopping upgraded ™

Read full topic

item.title: Where can I buy
item.dc:creator: @sanga282 sanga282
item.description:
@sanga282 wrote:

[quote=“Fat Cookies, post:14, topic:269509”][quote author=sanga282 link=topic=355678.msg2723453#msg2723453 date=1238138139]
internet is great for buying, i doubt any of the sites would be of use to you though because i buy from UK sellers
[/quote]
dabs.com is good UK retailer.

Anything outside the UK, just use eBay![/quote]
dabs is ok but ebuyer is better

item.title: Where can I buy
item.dc:creator: @Ford_2_Race Ford 2 Race
item.description:
@Ford_2_Race wrote:

[quote=“bowserjr2, post:9, topic:269509”][quote author=R.I.P RSC link=topic=355678.msg2722334#msg2722334 date=1238080294]

I wouldn’t trust online stores.

Online stores are really trustworthy, just look for a certification image thingy on their site.

Well, at least Dutch sites have certifications, which shows if they are reliable.
[/quote]



Are the Safe to buy things from MITB now?
Just joking, use google if its good people will write good about it, and if you should be unlucky remember to know your rigths.
Bought my computer online and two week later I got it, so its safe.
Yes, and speaking of trusting shop, Elkjøp that sell computers and things like that “scamming” people by have much higher prices in their shop that on their webshop.[/quote]

So I see.

Read full topic

You don’t have a specialized computer hardware store near you?

K-Mart, no chance.
Wal-mart, don’t have one here, so don’t know.
Best Buy, uhh…[/quote]
How is there no Wal-Mart where you live?
